threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: detect log.dat of remcos and registry entry

match_context.values: @{EventID=13; EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; Details=Binary Data; TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-1070296143-2877979003-364783958-1001\Software\Rmc-SVFNLP\exepath}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Binaries and Scripts in Public Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a file with a suspicious extension in the public folder, which could indicate potential malicious activity.

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\Name_File.js; EventID=11}
@{TargetFilename=c:\users\public\downloads\name_file.js}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Windows Shell/Scripting Application File Write to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Windows shells and scripting applications that write files to suspicious folders

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\Name_File.js}
@{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\Name_File.js:Zone.Identifier}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a file ending in jse, vbe, js, vba, vbs written by cscript.exe or wscript.exe

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\Name_File.js}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Script Interpreter Execution From Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious script execution in temporary folders or folders accessible by environment variables
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Registry Tampering by Potentially Suspicious Processes
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects suspicious registry modifications made by suspicious processes such as script engine processes such as WScript, or CScript etc.
These processes are rarely used for legitimate registry modifications, and their activity may indicate an attempt to modify the registry
without using standard tools like regedit.exe or reg.exe, potentially for evasion and persistence.

match_context.values: @{EventType=SetValue; EventID=13; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; Details=QWORD (0x00000000-0x004d9cf5); TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-1070296143-2877979003-364783958-1001\Software\Microsoft\Windows Script\Settings\Telemetry\wscript.exe\JScriptSetScriptStateStarted}
@{EventID=13; Details=Binary Data; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; EventType=SetValue; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Notifications\Data\418A073AA3BC1C75}

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET JA3 Hash - Remcos 3.x/4.x TLS Connection
